snippet: Interior Ministry officials said on Wednesday that prison authorities are close to a decision to return Hosni Mubarak, the former president, to a hospital outside the penal system.
abstract: Former President Hosni Mubarak’s health has deteriorated so sharply since he was first taken to prison five days ago that Egyptian authorities are close to a decision to return him to a hospital outside the penal system.

byline.original: By DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK and MAYY EL SHEIKH

lead_paragraph: Interior Ministry officials said on Wednesday that prison authorities are close to a decision to return Hosni Mubarak, the former president, to a hospital outside the penal system.

headline.seo: Officials Say Hosni Mubarak’s Health Is Worsening Rapidly
headline.main: Mubarak May Be Returned to Hospital as Health Slips
headline.print_headline: Mubarak May Be Returned To Hospital as Health Slips

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
